ValidationRule.description: 荷主と同じ系列かどうか
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: /*判断要件*/ Account__c != NULL && InvoiceAccount__c != NULL && /*判断項目*/ (Account__r.ParentId <> InvoiceAccount__c) && (Account__r.ParentId <> InvoiceAccount__r.ParentId) && (Account__c <> InvoiceAccount__r.ParentId)
